sub_topic: Identifying the clique number of a graph.
message_1: Consider a graph with 6 vertices and the following edges: (1,2), (1,3), (2,3), (2,4), (3,5), (4,5), (4,6), and (5,6). Using the concept of identifying the clique number of a graph, determine the maximum number of vertices in a fully connected subgraph of this graph.
